text: Gei God gaa wanga gi Abraham di hagadabu o di sirkumsais, e hai di haga modongoohia o di hagababa deelaa. Abraham ga sirkumsais Isaac nia laangi e walu i muli dono haanau, gei Isaac ga sirkumsais dana dama daane go Jacob, gei Jacob ga sirkumsais ana dama daane dilongoholu maa lua, ala go tadau maadua mmaadua.7.8 Genesis 17.10-14; 21.2-4; 25.26; 29.31; 35.18
